BandofSizzlingThunder.name: BandofSizzlingThunder
BandofSizzlingThunder.effect:
Increases Lightning DMG by 10%.
When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

BelobogoftheArchitects.name: BelobogoftheArchitects
BelobogoftheArchitects.effect: Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

CelestialDifferentiator.name: CelestialDifferentiator
CelestialDifferentiator.effect: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches 120% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 60% until the end of their first attack.

ChampionofStreetwiseBoxing.name: ChampionofStreetwiseBoxing
ChampionofStreetwiseBoxing.effect:
Increases Physical DMG by 10%.
After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

EagleofTwilightLine.name: EagleofTwilightLine
EagleofTwilightLine.effect:
Increases Wind DMG by 10%.
After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

FiresmithofLavaForging.name: FiresmithofLavaForging
FiresmithofLavaForging.effect:
Increases Fire DMG by 10%.
Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for the next attack.

FleetoftheAgeless.name: FleetoftheAgeless
FleetoftheAgeless.effect: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

GeniusofBrilliantStars.name: GeniusofBrilliantStars
GeniusofBrilliantStars.effect:
Increases Quantum DMG by 10%.
When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

GuardofWutheringSnow.name: GuardofWutheringSnow
GuardofWutheringSnow.effect:
Reduces DMG taken by 8%.
At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50%, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

HunterofGlacialForest.name: HunterofGlacialForest
HunterofGlacialForest.effect:
Increases Ice DMG by 10%.
After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

InertSalsotto.name: InertSalsotto
InertSalsotto.effect: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

KnightofPurityPalace.name: KnightofPurityPalace
KnightofPurityPalace.effect:
Increases DEF by 15%.
Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by 20%.

MusketeerofWildWheat.name: MusketeerofWildWheat
MusketeerofWildWheat.effect:
ATK increases by 12%.
The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

PanGalacticCommercialEnterprise.name: PanGalacticCommercialEnterprise
PanGalacticCommercialEnterprise.effect: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

PasserbyofWanderingCloud.name: PasserbyofWanderingCloud
PasserbyofWanderingCloud.effect:
Increases Outgoing Healing by 10%.
At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.

SpaceSealingStation.name: SpaceSealingStation
SpaceSealingStation.effect: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.

SprightlyVonwacq.name: SprightlyVonwacq
SprightlyVonwacq.effect: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

TaliaKingdomofBanditry.name: TaliaKingdomofBanditry
TaliaKingdomofBanditry.effect: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

ThiefofShootingMeteor.name: ThiefofShootingMeteor
ThiefofShootingMeteor.effect:
Increases Break Effect by 16%.
Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

WastelanderofBanditryDesert.name: WastelanderofBanditryDesert
WastelanderofBanditryDesert.effect:
Increases Imaginary DMG by 10%.
When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.
